params._l1MessageRelayer: L1 message relayer bridging contract address (L1CrossDomainMessengerProxy).
params._l1TokenRelayer: L1 token relayer bridging contract address (L1StandardBridgeProxy).

getBridgingDecimals().details: Gets the maximum number of token decimals able to be transferred across the bridge.

params.data: Bytes message data sent from L2.

sendMessage(address,uint256,bytes,uint25.details: Sends a single message to the L2 side via a corresponding bridge.

params.bridgePayload: Bridge payload necessary (if required) for a specific bridge relayer.
params.transferAmount: Actual OLAS amount to be transferred.

sendMessageBatch(address[],uint256[],byt.details: Sends a batch message to the L2 side via a corresponding bridge.

params.bridgePayload: Bridge payload necessary (if required) for a specific bridge relayer.
params.transferAmount: Actual total OLAS amount across all the targets to be transferred.

updateHashMaintenance(bytes32).details: Updated the batch hash of a failed message, if applicable.

params.batchHash: Unique batch hash for each message transfer.
